Articles.Content:
hi guys ! I know that a lot of replicas of the ITS have already been made but i didn't see anyone who made it with in the same time the real size of this monster and a realistic look. so i think that this HUGE reproduction of ~1500 parts and 7000 tonnes really deserve to be show .

I already made a presentation video with a small storyline (i'm from french community so the video have subtitle in french but don't worry there are some in English too in the yt option) and i hope you'll enjoy it 

there is the download link ^^ https://kerbalx.com/
This is just spectacular. And after all this, you're only a newbie? Here's some rep.
thanks ^^ this is my first post on the international forum so it's normal that i'm only "newbie" while i have hundreds hours of game but i'll probably continue to post my new craft here

8 hours ago, xenolifer said:

thanks ^^ this is my first post on the international forum so it's normal that i'm only "newbie" while i have hundreds hours of game but i'll probably continue to post my new craft here

And you are welcome to do so!
